item.title: Lawrie Park Road SE26 next to Crystal Palac, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: Crystal Palace Parade SE19 next to streetl, 2nd October
item.description:
Crystal Palace Parade SE19 next to streetlight column 19 is a bus stop and the litter bin by the bus stop flag (with the letter “S” on top of it) is graffiti tagged. Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4232065,-0.0765494,3a,75y,108.48h,97.84t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sWupjWEzaa8v6VGxeha5ojg!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D-7.843824337881912%26panoid%3DWupjWEzaa8v6VGxeha5ojg%26yaw%3D108.48097125943814!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkzMC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.title: Street light not working people urinating underneath it, 2nd October

item.title: Human Fecal waste and Dog Poo, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: Bagged waist outside of number 20 Blenheim Terrace, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: 2 Broken Lights on Riverton Close, 2nd October
item.description:
Two broken lights in Riverton Close: - The street lamp post near the steps leading to numbers 14–30 Riverton Close. - The wall-mounted lamp above the same steps. Both lights have been out for some time, leaving that corner and the adjacent section of the car park completely dark at night. This creates a serious safety hazard for residents using the steps and parking area. The lack of lighting also makes the area more susceptible to criminal activity.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Riverton Close, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish overflow, 2nd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rutherglen Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
